mapper.insert: INSERT INTO rooms ( accommodation_id, name, description, capacity, price_per_night, room_type, bed_type, bathroom_count, amenities, status, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{accommodationId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{capacity}, #{pricePerNight}, #{roomType}, #{bedType}, #{bathroomCount}, #{amenities}, #{status}, NOW(), NOW() )
